Title: Relates to validating certain grants of lands and charters
Summary: Relates to validating certain grants of lands and charters made by the king of Great Britain before October 14, 1775 and giving the legislature certain authority.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to article 1 of the constitution, in relation to validating certain grants of land and charters made by the king of Great Britain before October 14, 1775 and giving the legislature the authority to enact laws to implement this section
